name: Doki Doki Gravity Dive
storyline:
Since the game has no win condition, a story would make little sense. So I didn't bother adding any lore.

However growing up with the Atari 2600, thinking up my own stories for games, was always fun. And I encourage you to do the same here.

Are you even playing as the good guy? Only you know!
summary:
Doki Doki Gravity Dive is a Score Attack Shoot 'em Up with tiny solar systems as your playground which are populated with tiny worlds and a singularity at their center.

Enemies relentlessly invade and it is up to you to keep them at bay. At least for as long as you can!

Each celestial body has its own gravitational pull and to stand even the slightest chance to survive the never ending onslaught, you have to adapt to changes in gravity quickly and throw concepts like up and down out the window!

So hop, fly, dodge, shoot and (hopefully) have fun!
...until the heat death of the universe.
